title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Litecoin (LTC) Drops 6.1%, Leading Index Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Filecoin (FIL) was also among the underperformers, declining 2.9% from Monday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3147.53, down 0.7% (-22.88) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Four of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: AAVE (+9.8%) and HBAR (+0.7%).

Laggards: LTC (-6.1%) and FIL (-2.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 0.7% with more assets trading lower than higher, led by significant drops in LTC (-6.1%) and FIL (-2.9%).
